summary: Astute professional with 7 Years of experience in requirement analysis, design, development and testing of various Data Warehouse/Business Intelligence applications.  Experienced in Dimensional Data Modeling in designing DataMart and Data warehouse using star schema, snow flake schema and Datavault methodology. Technical hands-on experience on full life cycle of SDLC from gathering system requirements to deploying system into Production.  Strong knowledge of ETL Development using Informatica and experience in UNIX and Control-M technologies. Experience with data modelling using Sybase Powerdesigner as a tool. Currently working as  Scrum master in Agile methodology.

profile_positions.description:
•	Gathering requirements from the client and converting the functional specifications to the technical specifications.
•	Analysis of new requirement given by client.
•	One to One interaction with teams like PaaS, SaaS, TaaS, IaaS for a successful development, testing and deployment of a single project.
•	Following up and coordinating with business users and various stakeholders.
•	Providing knowledge to new members in the team.
•	Development of Informatica Code, Unit Testing, Performing System and Integration Testing and get it migrated to Production, done along with the data modelling.
•	Reviews of the code developed by the peers.
•	Functional Acceptance testing and the regression testing of large number of files delivered to the banks.
profile_positions.title: Onsite Co-ordinator |ETL Informatica| Data Modelling

profile_positions.description:
•	Leading a team of 4 talents from offshore.
•	Discussion with onsite personnel and analysis of new requirement given by client.
•	Tracking of deliverables (at module level) from offshore.
•	One to One interaction with multiple vendors from geographically distributed teams/DBAs for a successful development, testing and deployment of a single project.
•	Following up and coordinating with business users and various stakeholders.
•	Managing migration activities to UAT / PROD with R2O for various changes.
•	Technical guidance on INFORMATICA /SQL/PL-SQL/ UNIX to subordinates/offshore team.
•	Mentoring peers and providing knowledge to new members in the team.
•	Understanding of the ADW concepts & coding standards.
•	Development of PL/SQL code- package and stored procedures.
•	Development of Informatica Code, Unit Testing, Performing System and Integration Testing and get it migrated to Production.
•	Bug resolution of the Informatica Code developed and the discrepancies reported by downstream applications.
•	Documentation reviews
•	Involved in production deployment and implementation activities.
•	Overall handling of the project from offshore.
profile_positions.title: Technology Analyst | DNA- ETL Informatica

profile_positions.description:
•	Understanding the business requirements. Development of code in Informatica, unit testing and end to end testing of the newly developed Informatica code for the jobs running in client specific DM tool. 
•	Documentation such as creating Issue trackers, test plan, impact analysis documents
•	Escalate issues to the appropriate teams as needed to ensure the most efficient and expedient means to problem resolution.
•	Monitoring errors through logs and the client specific scheduler used for monitoring of batch.
•	Act as an escalation point between the service delivery/support team to help identify and troubleshoot service problems.
•	As a part of production support, responding to alerts on monitoring tools and identify the root cause and troubleshoot.
profile_positions.title: Senior Software Engineer

profile_positions.description:
•	Participating in client calls and involved in the requirement gathering through Onsite coordination.
•	Participating in Data Migration activities from Neoview to Teradata
•	Analyzing SQL Queries and the existing graphs in Ab-Initio
•	Development, Unit Testing, Performing System and Integration Testing of the code
•	Documentation- creating Issue Trackers, test plans.
•	Involved in testing and debugging of the new and existing the Ab-Initio Code
•	Reconciliation of database objects at all levels – database, schema, column and row level data
•	Code changes in ab initio graphs from Neoview queries to Teradata compliant queries
•	Support the Post deployment code maintenance.
•	Incident management for production incidents.
•	Monitoring and resolving service requests raised by business/functional teams.
profile_positions.title: Technology Analyst
